statement.p: Amoxicillin is a common antibiotic prescribed for children. It is a liquid suspension composed of part amoxicillin and part water.
In one formulation there are 150 mg of amoxicillin in 4 cubic centimeters (cc's) of the liquid suspension. Dr. Scarlotti prescribes 300 mg per day for a 2-yr old child with an ear infection.
